Html:
Does the D3 WPF Dynamic Data Display supports overlay graph (viewing multiple graphs in a single frame)?

we need the overlay feature such as users can load different sets of data bases on their selection of data sets and compare them in a single frame

(x and y scale are the same for all sets of data) 

Maybe one time, they want load 20 sets of data, next time they may want to lod 50 sets of data and do the comparison. 

thx!
